ingredients.content: 30 - 50 g lemon juice (approx. 1 - 1.5 lemons), to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste (optional)

preparations.content: Place garlic clove into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and repeat <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.

Add chickpeas, lemon juice, tahini, extra virgin olive oil, ground cumin (optional), water, salt and pepper (optional) and mix <b>10-15 sec/speed 5<b>, or until desired consistency is achieved.  Serve immediately, garnished with paprika or sumac.
